title: Winter's Bite
description: Older cover edition of ASIN B004YTFDV4Many years ago, Ysabon made her living by the sword as a skilled mercenary. Now she lives in Westedge with her brother's children, tending to the animals and afraid of dying old and useless. When a horrible winter storm drives monsters down from the mountains, Ysabon can save her family and her village if only she can find the strength and take up the sword for a final battle.  Winter's Bite is an epic fantasy short story by Annie Bellet.  *Bonus Material Included* Read the first five chapters of the dark fairytale fantasy A Heart in Sun and Shadow free in this ebook.
author: Annie Bellet
